title: Frying
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Enjoy delectable fried foods - light, crispy and golden-brown. Chef Shelley Handler's class gives cooks the confidence to achieve these results every time. Review the properties of various fats and oils, the critical importance of temperature, breading/coating techniques and much more. In addition to enhancing your cooking repertoire, each recipe incorporates valuable pointers that apply to frying in general. Recipes include: Devilled Crab Cakes, Corn and Clam Fritters, Sonoma Kiev and Buttermilk Pan-Fried Chicken.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
